item.title: Chase Reportedly in Advanced Talks to Become New Apple Card Partner
item.description: JPMorgan Chase is in “advanced talks” with Apple about becoming the Apple Card’s new financial partner, according to The Wall Street Journal. JPMorgan owns Chase Bank, one of the largest banking chain
